src

接口 Database

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ComputerDatabase, EmployeeDatabase, StoreDatabase

    public interface Database

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(java.lang.String toAdd)
      add the appropriate type of object to the database after gathering the necessary information about it from the input string
      boolean contains(java.lang.String toFind)
      check whether the appropriate object exists within the database
      java.lang.String[] list()
      return an array of the result of the toString() method for each object stored in the database
      void remove(java.lang.String toRemove)
      remove the appropriate object from the corresponding array

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        void add(java.lang.String toAdd)
        add the appropriate type of object to the database after gathering the necessary information about it from the input string
        参数:
        toAdd - the String to be added

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String toRemove)
        remove the appropriate object from the corresponding array
        参数:
        toRemove - the String to be removed

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.lang.String toFind)
        check whether the appropriate object exists within the database
        参数:
        toFind - the String to be found
        返回:
        true if found, false if not

      • list

        java.lang.String[] list()
        return an array of the result of the toString() method for each object stored in the database
        返回:
        an array of the result of the toString() method for each object
